channel.title: Technology Flickr Plugin Wordpress Api Key Falbum on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: falbum broke due to its flickr API key expiring.
item.description: So falbum, the awesome flickr photo gallery for wordpress, broke this afternoon around 4pm due to the API key for the plugin expiring. This is annoying and somewhat funny. It seems that as of right now - all falbum sites are broken. hah. Every single one. Doesn’t this seem to be a flaw in flickr’s API program. I hope there is a way for the author of flabum to renew his API key.
